external_games.name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV with Power Up Kit
Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV with Power Up Kit

name: Romance of the Three Kingdoms IV with Power Up Kit
summary: "Romance of the Three Kingdoms Ⅳ with Power Up Kit" was released in 1994 as an expansion to the 4th release in the series. About 450 officers appear in the game and "Frontier Tribes" have been added as a diplomatic element. In battle, in addition to the standard field and castle battles, we also include final battles inside the castles and large weapons like chariots and catapults.
